info.title: Netflow Academy API
info.description: API documentation for Netflow Academy Learning Management System

post.description: Authenticate user and return API token
Update authenticated user profile with form data including avatar upload

avatar.description: Avatar image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp - max 2MB)

post.description: Send password reset link to email

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

post.description: Logout user and revoke current token

get.description: Get all active courses with pagination and basic information

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in course title and description

get.description: Get detailed course information including modules, lessons, instructor, and reviews
Get all categories with course count
Get all active instructors with their statistics
Get all course reviews with pagination

get.summary: List discussion threads for a course
get.description: Returns paginated top-level discussion threads for the given course.

post.description: Only enrolled (active) users can create threads.

get.summary: Get a discussion thread with replies
get.description: Returns the thread and its replies with user enrollment info.

put.description: Only the owner or course instructor can update.

delete.description: Only the owner or course instructor can delete.

post.description: Upvote or remove upvote from a discussion post.
Mark a discussion question as answered (only question owner or instructor can do this).

get.summary: Get exams for a specific course and batch
get.description: Get all active exams for a specific course and batch (only enrolled students can access)

post.description: Start an exam session (only enrolled students can start)
Submit exam answers and automatically calculate score

403.description: Not enrolled or exam not in progress

get.description: Get user's exam result summary if already submitted

get.summary: Get detailed exam result with answers
get.description: Get detailed exam result showing correct answers, user answers, and question-wise analysis

get.summary: Get enrolled courses for logged-in user
get.description: Returns all courses the user is enrolled in, with batch, course, modules, lessons, instructor details and progress tracking

post.description: Submit an assignment for a course. Validates enrollment, batch timing, and assignment deadlines.

403.description: Access denied - not enrolled or deadline passed

get.description: Get all assignments for enrolled courses with submission status

content.example: Can someone explain the difference between X and Y?

description.example: An exam to test fundamental PHP knowledge.
An exam to test fundamental PHP knowledge.
Learn the basics of web development
